H0.text: Which river flows into the North Sea at Hamburg. Rhine

H1.text: Which river flows into the North Sea at Hamburg. Weser

H2.text: Which river flows into the North Sea at Hamburg. Ems

H3.text: Which river flows into the North Sea at Hamburg. Elbe

A4.text: The Elbe flows into the North Sea at Cuxhaven, 110 kilometres northwest of Hamburg.
